common.parser

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.parser.Parser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PythonParser

    public abstract class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aims at parsing a tokenized code to create the AST.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parser

        protected Parser(Lexer lexer)
        Constructor of the class. Initializes the Parser with the tokenized source code and the AST to create.
        Parameters:
        lexer - Lexer containing the tokenized code to parse.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public abstract AST parse()
        Main method of the parser. It parses the program to create the AST.
        Returns:
        The AST extracted from the source code.

      • show_next

        protected Token show_next()
        Returns the next token to process without modifying the list of tokens.
        Returns:
        The next Token to process.

      • expect

        protected Token expect(java.lang.String kind)
                throws java.text.ParseException
        Process the next token if its kind matches the one given. If not, a ParseException is raised.
        Parameters:
        kind - Expected kind of the next token to process.
        Returns:
        The token which is processed.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - When the next token kind doesn't match the given one.

      • accept_it

        protected Token accept_it()
        Process the next token.
        Returns:
        The token which was accepted.

      • sizeOfTab

        protected int sizeOfTab(Token token)
        Computes the number of tabulation of the specified tabulation token.
        Parameters:
        token - The tab token to process.
        Returns:
        The number of tabulation of the given tab token.
